# Welcome {-}

This is a website that documents the work and process of the TIES Data Team.

Our mission is **to develop open-science tooling for providing archival quality data products and capacity to research team members and external stakeholders with integrity and in a timely fashion.**

## Orientation {-}
- Read our [statement of purpose](#dt-purpose)
- See our [list of members](#dt-structure)
- View the sidebar to see the full list of articles
